text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Import all the codes that are contained in NPU Laboratory Codes VS
  • Import all the codes that are contained in Results Laboratory Observation - IPS

name: LaboratoryResultStandardEuVs
title: Standard Laboratory Codes
